Question: Gwangju City CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Gwangju Metropolitan City

Gwangju City will participate in CES 2024, showcasing innovative technologies from 13 companies including inDJ, Myren, Intflow, Tudnib, Newjac, Davida, Zeta Bank AI Healthcare Research Institute, Blue Capsule, Deepmedi, Bentech Frontier, Artlab, Ncer, and Avirtual. The showcased solutions include "Edgefarm," "inDJ for Connected Car & App," and "GENICLASS and GENIPEN," which received the CES 2024 Innovation Award. The city will provide services such as overseas market consultation, booth setup, translation, and media promotion to help the companies achieve successful international expansion. The participating companies will exhibit flagship products, engage in business meetings with global partners, and explore collaboration opportunities. The city aims to build collaborative partnerships with global companies and promote Gwangju's innovative companies worldwide.
Summary_cn:
光州都市特别市

光州市将参加 2024 年国际消费电子展，展示来自 inDJ、Myren、Intflow、Tudnib、Newjac、Davida、Zeta Bank AI Healthcare Research Institute、Blue Capsule、Deepmedi、Bentech Frontier、Artlab、Ncer 和 Avirtual 等 13 家公司的创新技术。展出的解决方案包括"Edgefarm"，"连接汽车与应用的 inDJ"以及获得 CES 2024 创新奖的"GENICLASS 和 GENIPEN"。该市将提供海外市场咨询、展位搭建、翻译和媒体宣传等服务，以帮助这些公司实现成功的国际扩张。参展公司将展示旗舰产品，在与全球合作伙伴的商业会议上进行洽谈，并寻求合作机会。该市旨在与全球公司建立合作伙伴关系，并推广光州的创新型企业。
